MemoryInfobox.previous: An Eye for an Eye (Odyssey)|An Eye for an Eye

General_Description: '''Fancy Guests''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra had had enough of [[Markos]]'s scheming, but the fun wasn't quite over. Unknown visitors had docked in [[Kephallonia]], and Markos was sure they would stand in the way of his plans.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra departed [[Markos' Vineyard]] and headed toward where the newcomers were located.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The abandoned house, and the people.''
Kassandra attacked those at the [[Abandoned House, Kephallonia|abandoned house]], eventually defeating the last thug. While he lay before Kassandra, [[Elpenor]] emerged to slit his throat.
*'''Elpenor:''' ''I normally have someone else do the field work. I don't suppose ''you'' know how to get this stain out.''

<tabber>
|-|Stay back or else.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''There'll be more blood if you step closer.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Perhaps. But then you won't hear my proposition, misthios.''
|-|You get used to blood. I did.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It comes with the territory.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Then you're just the ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]'' I'm looking for.''
</tabber>
[[File:ACOD Fancy Guest - Kassandra Questioning Elpenor.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra questioning Elpenor's actions]]
Elpenor looked at the nearby bodies.
*'''Elpenor:''' ''A clean slaughter. ''Very'' good work.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Not much sympathy for the men who work with you.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Not with me, ''for'' me. Employees. Now ex-employees, I suppose.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So you don't work for the [[Cyclops]].''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Your kind aren't usually believers of myth.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Not the monster, the man. You ''are'' an outsider. Why are you here?''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Indeed, I'm not from [[Kephallonia]]. I'm ''here'' because what I'm looking for ''is''. If you'll follow me, Kassandra.''
[[File:ACOD Fancy Guest - Elpenor Kassandra Beach.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra and Elpenor at the beach]]
Kassandra followed Elpenor further to the beach.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Who are you? How do you know my name?''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''I'm Elpenor of [[Kirrha]]. How do I know your name? I did what you did. I asked, and people told me.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Tell me who sent you.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''An inquisitive nature—good. That will help.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You know more than you let on.''
[[File:ACOD Fancy Guests - Elpenor Proposal.png|thumb|250px|Elpenor proposing a deal with Kassandra]]
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Knowing you is in my best interest. And knowing ''me'' is in yours. My prized possession was stolen and brought to [[Ithaka]]. [[Penelope]]'s woven [[Shroud of Penelope|shroud]]. I need you to steal it back.''
(If players choose "What? Penelope's shroud?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The shroud of Penelope? The wife of [[Odysseus]]? You're joking.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''A piece of it, yes.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Impossible. If it existed, it would be priceless.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Which is why I want it back.''
(If players choose "Where do I start looking?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Ithaka is not a small island. I need more information.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''I'd start at the home of Odysseus. Well, what's left of it. An inspiring tale. A reunion of past lovers.''
(If players choose "I'll get the shroud back.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''All right, I'll do it.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Don't expect it to be easy.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's why it will cost you.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Then it's agreed. There's a rowboat in the harbor. Use it. It's not meant for open water, so be wise. When you have the shroud, meet me in the temple of [[Zeus]].''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I will.''
*'''Elpenor:''' ''Oh, and ''misthios''... Don't fail.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed the "visitors" south of Sami. In doing so, she met Elpenor, a man who requested her to recover Penelope's prized shroud.
